WRITING.TEXT:
That new AMC in Manhattan is pretty swanky. Much in common with the Warren out east.
Maybe this new thing will tank and I can make a quick buy and turn it into my house...

Yeah, I know what you mean. I saw a black and red Pebble 2 for 27 bucks brand new on Amazon last week and waited til payday only to find it gone.
I started my collection last month, and hope to keep snagging cheapies like this over the next few paychecks and assembling a full set. Aiming for 200 total.

Refurbished. No wear. Bright shiny face. Box, charger, Pebble stickers, the whole shebang.
Shoulda done it, Homie.
Check Groupon. I see the same watch all over there labeled Women's Pebble Watch. 40 plus shipping.
Nah, that person is right. I was high as fuck, dicking with my watch, on the clock at missile command when I commented on that...

That band. What a thriller!
Did you sell that, too?
Casio AE-11W
Did it have the red second hand and the green and red dots in the hour marks?

Someplace with tons, and TONS of micromanaging.
Everybody needs to feel like they get to enforce something.
Great place, really!
Maybe, I'm no Oracle, but I have been watching prices tumble since the Fitbit aqquisition was announced...

I also recently got a fresh OG pebble, and afterwards was ripped off to a Woot sale and bought a time for 40 bucks. It's awesome. Much snappier than the OG model, plus the color screen really does make the watch feel more 'premium', and it's more reasonably sized for someone with smaller wrists.
Great price at 40 bucks, but I bet in 6 months time the same watch can be had for half...

Probably is subjective. Try this place out sometime, I bet you can find a million reasons to yearn for a noose around here.
Besides, the fuzz once told me I can't smoke a bowl without penn time involved, now I can hop down to the corner shop and pick of a shit ton of dabs and high five the same fuzz on the way out the door.
I do!
That IS a Casio digital watch face. Casio AE-11W.
Also, does anyone else sport this face? What do the green and red dots on the hours mean?

WRITING.TITLE: Job says NO SMARTWATCHES. Think this face will leave them off my case?

Check out Laser Fart. Season 3 of Rick and Morty wants you to see episode 5 of Laser Fart in particular.

No remakes, bit if they really are doing several more, I hope interstellar computer technology becomes more CRT based. All the fancy HD monitors and hologram projectors in Prometheus really crapped all over continuity...

I have the all the seasons ripped to a portable drive, and load them up until 03e23, and let it play on loop.
Sometimes, I mess with later seasons, but the pre-Potter era is all that really matters to me.
Seasons 4+ are awesome, but to me a different show.

Ya, so morning came. Ran an update, and now it's working.
Pretty cool little gadget for 2 bucks and some change.
eBay gave me a 15 dollar coupon for a fubar'd order and I found this thing shipped for 17.50.
Now I'm thinking about a round Time...

This this just came in the mail today. eBay. Looks untouched, but doesn't seem to want to turn on. It's been doing nothing but this for five hours. No combination of buttons held seems to make a difference, though for the first half or or so, it went between this screen and a Pebble logo and back and forth...
Think, maybe I got a dud?
